warlords_ctf.name: Capture The Flag
warlords_ctf.description: Complete 1 match with at least 10 kills or assists in Capture the Flag.

warlords_tdm.name: Team Deathmatch
warlords_tdm.description: Complete 1 match with at least 10 kills or assists in Team Deathmatch.

warlords_domination.name: Domination
warlords_domination.description: Complete 1 match with at least 15 kills or assists in Domination.

warlords_dedication.name: Dedication
warlords_dedication.description: Complete 30 matches with at least 10 kills or assists in any game mode.
